title: Devi Nakshi Haaram - Divine Emerald and Diamond Necklace
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Intricate Nakshi work depicting Goddess Lakshmi at the pendant's center. The necklace features a floral motif design, with each element meticulously set with sparkling diamonds and interspersed with vibrant emeralds and ruby accents. Dangles of South Sea pearls add a touch of elegance. The design reflects traditional Andhra Pradesh artistry.
colors: complemented by the rich Green of Emeralds
and the creamy luster of South Sea Pearls.
occasions: traditional festivals like Ugadi and Dasara
and grand receptions. It's also suitable for sophisticated modern events where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: This Haaram is a timeless piece showcasing the pinnacle of South Indian craftsmanship. The Nakshi work is exquisitely detailed, and the combination of emeralds, diamonds, and pearls symbolizes prosperity, purity, and wisdom. It's a valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations, embodying both traditional significance and lasting beauty.
